Text: I have heard, anecdotally, of a medium-sized publisher being quoted in excess of £10,000 for the establishment of an ONIX feed to a major UK distributor, an offer which the publisher declined in favour of continuing to type metadata into a web form.
Cause: the establishment of an ONIX feed to a major UK distributor, an offer which the publisher declined in favour of continuing to type metadata into a web form.
Effect: I have heard, anecdotally, of a medium-sized publisher being quoted in excess of £10,000
Sentence: <e2>I have heard, anecdotally, of a medium-sized publisher being quoted in excess of £10,000</e2> for <e1>the establishment of an ONIX feed to a major UK distributor, an offer which the publisher declined in favour of continuing to type metadata into a web form.</e1>
